parm: Number of tropical nights (annual count of days when daily minimum temperature > 20 Celsius)
Warm spell duration index: annual count of days with at least 6 consecutive days when maximum temperature > 90th percentile
Cold spell duration index: annual count of days with at least 6 consecutive days when minimum temperature < 10th percentile
Growing season length: annual count between the first span of at least 6 days with daily mean temperature TG >5 Celsius and the first span after July 1st  of 6 days with TG <5 Celsius
